price: Então, quando Nossos claros sinais lhes chegaram, disseram: "Isto é evidente magia!"
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡهُمۡ ءَايَٰتُنَا مُبۡصِرَةٗ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāathum āyātunā mub'ṣiratan qālū hādhā siḥ'run mubīnun
